@buizachristina I loved it! The acting, dialogue and soundtrack were all great. The natural aging of the characters is fascinating to watch.
Finally going to see "Boyhood" tonight with my sweetie @604schwartz. I've heard nothing but great things. http://t.co/Vf5YLm8f6N
